name: pi-hole
tagline: A network wide DNS based ad and tracker blocker
description: Pi-hole is a self-hosted network-wide ad blocker and DNS sinkhole. It blocks ads and trackers across devices with a lightweight DNS solution and a web-based dashboard for configuration.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor blocking statistics, query logs, and network activity through an intuitive interface

features.title: Blocklist Management
features.description: Subscribe to curated blocklists or create custom lists for granular control

features.title: Query Logging
features.description: View detailed logs of all DNS queries with timestamps, clients, and block status

features.title: Whitelist And Blacklist
features.description: Override blocklists with custom allow and deny rules for specific domains

features.title: Dhcp Server
features.description: Optionally serve DHCP to automatically configure network devices to use Pi-hole

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate with other tools and scripts using the built-in REST API
